text: health and safety policies at performing arts venues notwithstanding any other provision of law upon the expiration of the state of emergency declared in response to the pandemic the owners operators and promoters of performing arts venues located in new hampshire shall have the authority to establish policies including mask requirements vaccine requirements testing requirements or a combination thereof in order to protect patrons staff performers and the venue s financial investments any person acting in good faith to administer or enforce a performing venue s health and safety policy shall be immune from civil liability arising from such conduct
